summary: Web project with admin panel and appointment management. User wants all references to 'Caffeine AI' (name, logo, links) removed from the website's footer, header, and all sections.

existing_features.title: Remove all references to 'Caffeine AI' from the Footer component — including the name, any logo/icon, and any associated links or attribution text.

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove all 'Caffeine AI' branding (name, logo, links) from website footer, header, and every section
Remove all references to 'Caffeine AI' from the Header component — including the name, any logo/icon, and any associated links.

Audit and remove all references to 'Caffeine AI' (name, logo, links, or attribution) from every other page or section component across the entire frontend — including but not limited to Home, HeroSection, ContactSection, ServicesGrid, DoctorProfile, TestimonialCarousel, and all admin pages.
